participant_1.name: Tom
participant_1.personality: A pragmatic and straightforward individual who values responsibility and loyalty. He enjoys outdoor activities, especially hiking with his dog.
participant_1.background: i have a german shepherd named barnaby. my favorite color is grey. i'm terrified of scorpions. my father drove a car for nascar. i'm employed by the us postal service.

participant_2.name: Sophie
participant_2.personality: Enthusiastic and motivated, she thrives on physical challenges and inspires others to lead a healthy lifestyle. She's passionate about fitness and enjoys helping people achieve their goals.
participant_2.background: i love running and preparing for marathons. i am a clean eater. i got a new job just yesterday to be a life coach. my parents were both very athletic.
